reviewText: Great Video, Some Hot Girls from Wrestling's Past

This DVD with wrestling "vixens" (not a fan of the "sport", but like the women) is divided into 3 parts: some very pedestrian live pro wrestling event footage, some cable-edit versions of boy/girl scenes (they go out of their way so you don't see anything), and sexy glamour vignettes with the girls, dancing and posing for the camera in hot outfits, topless & beyond. Fast-forwarded thru all the live wrestling stuff, and much of the cable-edit action (although Krysti's scene & the 1st scene-I believe Jessica Darlin-were good). Best thing here is there's some pretty good full frontal and reverse nudity with close-ups and spreads (especially Krysti who goes all out), but they ruin much of it with too many quick cuts and not holding on the "good stuff" long enough. As always, some girls are hotter and show more/ do more than others. The best girls are Krysti, Jessica & Missy, but be warned - lots of plastic surgery here, and some of it is a bit disturbing if you don't dig that look (particularly Missy-still found the body hot though). Worth viewing but pick it up at a bargain price if you can, and keep the remote handy.

THIS DVD FOLLOWS THE SAME PATTERN AS THE PREVIOUS ONES DID.

BEAUTIFUL VALETS BUTT NAKED IN STRIPPING ROUTINES.THIS WILL

DEFINATELY KEEP YOU AT FULL ERECTION, I MEAN FULL ATTENTION.

ENJOY

Ever since I've seen Missy Hyatt and Tammy sytch in wrestling, I've wanted to someday, possibly see them naked. My dream came true! This dvd also has porn star Kristy myst in it along with a couple of other porn stars whose names escape me at the moment.

This is an ideal blend of both sex and violence! The porn stars in the video actually have sex with some guys (I don't think they were wrestlers, but then I really wasn't paying attention to the dudes). The sex is not explicit, But you tell that they were really doing it.

Tammy and Missy however, have no such scenes, but they do get naked. COMPLETELY naked! Tammy seems to have put on a couple of pounds since her days in the WWF, but she is still superhot. And Missy Hyatt? Well, her age seems to have caught up with her (maybe out ran her), because she was looking kinda rough compared to what she used to be. But I would say that she is still better looking than most girls you see walking down the street.
